main event: A football-shaped object with four lights in a formation was observed over Mensey, New York on October 6, 1966.
interesting points: The object was traveling north at first, then suddenly turned northeast, gathered speed, and climbed rapidly.
At one point, the object shook and shuddered when it hit a 'white object', causing a white flash.
The observers claimed to have seen UFOs on other occasions and considered themselves experts in aviation.
There were numerous air routes and airports around the area.
A strong temperature inversion was reported at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: A football-shaped object with four lights
